snippet: Mr. Buffett, in Omaha with Mrs. Clinton, unleashed a withering attack on Mr. Trump for refusing to release his tax returns and for misleading voters about his success as a businessman....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Buffett, in Omaha with Mrs. Clinton, unleashed a withering attack on Mr. Trump for refusing to release his tax returns and for misleading voters about his success as a businessman.

headline.main: Warren Buffett Is Latest Billionaire to Excoriate Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Buffett, in Nebraska With Clinton, Excoriates Trump
